description.value:
Requirement You are under the effect of a meditation spell.

You perform the following as you Sustain your Meditation.

You seek intangible experiences to look back fondly upon. You create an ethereal gout of beautiful colored dragon flame overhead. You [[/act create-a-diversion variant=trick traits=visual,auditory]]{Create a Diversion (Deception)} / [[/act create-a-diversion variant=trick statistic=recitation traits=visual,auditory]]{Create a Diversion (Recitation)} with the Visual and Auditory traits. If you critically succeed against a creature whose level is less than twice this spellâ€™s rank, that creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Fascinated} with the display for 1 round.
